Class runGame

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
com.example.myapplication.runGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback, Runnable
public class runGame extends Thread implements android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
the create a game and run run the joysticks and the player and the bullets.
